name: Unnatural: Benighted
storyline:
An exciting story about two evil spirits hunters investigating the disappearance of people.

The main character Sim's wife disappears. During the investigation, he learns that she is in the hands of a powerful demon who is blackmailing our protagonist in every possible way.

He turns for help to his best friend Dan Vanhalen, who also has a personal score with the demon.

They will need to make a lot of effort to get out of this difficult situation.

When they begin to actively search for the main suspect, the danger in their path grows to incredible proportions. The police and the evil spirits hunters think that the same person is behind all these crimes...
summary: Two demon hunters investigate the disappearance of people and encounter unexplained phenomena.
